title: LabTwin
description: LabTwin is the world’s first voice and AI-powered digital lab assistant, working alongside scientists at the point of experimentation. Access data, look up information, coordinate experiments, take notes and record results in real-time from anywhere in your lab just by talking to LabTwin.
